About this portfolio

Finding Feng Shui

Don't like the flow of my UI? Click the toggle, use the click-and-drag handles to move stuff around then send me a screenshot when you've got something good (or very very bad).

What is this place?

All the features of this portfolio were written by me in vanilla JS because having an understanding of the fundamentals is important to me. I used SCSS to modulate my css and make use of functions, and used gulp to tie everything together and make for a nicer dev environment.

Home About Work Contact

Chris Nekich

Dev

What I'm About

A little about me

I just like to make things. It's always been that way. Stacking lego, throwing paint at a canvas, or better yet - my bedroom walls (sorry Mum!), playing with cameras or nailing blocks of wood together for no apparent reason; I revel in the act of creative expression and I live to solve a problem.

The projects displayed here were created during my time as a Web Development student at General Assembly, where I put my affinity for making and problem solving to good use. Over a 3 month, full time course, I made things every day. I explored, I experimented and I loved every minute of it.

Perhaps I could make things for you?

I am currently working as a Junior Front End Developer for a digital agency in Surry Hills
